LITURGY.Comment: No Divine Liturgy UNLESS It is Meeting of the LORD
Divine Liturgy of St John for Meeting of the LORD

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 3rd Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: King, Holy, and Almighty, Before you all creation stands in fear and trembling. Save us and forgive our sins, in Your great mercy

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.STICHOS: To You, Lord will I call; my God, be not silent to me

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 7th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: The Lord will give strength to his people! *
The Lord will bless his people with peace.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Gve ot the Lord, sons of God, give ot he Lord glory and praise!
